settings.course_message_unit_complete: You have now completed this unit.
settings.course_message_unit_not_logged_in: You cannot view this unit as you're not logged in yet.
settings.course_message_unit_pending: Have you completed this unit? Then mark this unit as completed.
settings.course_message_unit_no_access: Sorry, but you're not allowed to access this course.
settings.course_message_unit_not_yet: You need to complete the previous unit first.
settings.course_message_course_complete: You have now completed the whole course. Congratulations!
settings.course_message_quiz_open_grading_blockin: Your quiz has been submitted for grading by the course instructor. Once your grade has been entered, you will be able access the next unit.
settings.course_message_quiz_open_grading_non_blo: Your quiz has been submitted for grading by the course instructor. You have now completed this unit.
